lead_paragraph: Andy Murray won his first match since becoming a father as defending champion Britain and Japan tied 1-1 on the first day of their Davis Cup first-round match on Friday, while Novak Djokovic provided the point for Serbia, which is also 1-1 against Kazakhstan.

headline.main: Davis Cup: New Dad Murray Takes 1st Match, Djokovic Wins
